nbttag: {ench:[],display:{Lore:[0:"§7The Ender Dragon is a Boss found on the End island.",1:"§7It drops Dragon Fragments and Armor when killed.",2:"§7There are 7 types of dragons: Young, Old, Wise,",3:"§7Protector, Strong, Unstable and Superior."],Name:"§6Ender Dragon (Boss)"},ExtraAttributes:{id:"ENDER_DRAGON_BOSS"}}
info: Dragons are a boss that are spawned in the Dragons Nest located in The End, there are 7 possible dragons to spawn: Old, Protector, Wise, Young, Unstable, Strong, and Superior. All dragons excluding superior have the same chance with superior being the rarest dragon. To spawn the dragon, you need to place down 8 Summoning Eyes, which are obtained by killing Zealots in the end.
lore: §7The Ender Dragon is a Boss found on the End island.
§7It drops Dragon Fragments and Armor when killed.
§7There are 7 types of dragons: Young, Old, Wise,
